thread.title: Letter of thanks to Satler for his contribution to environmental preservation and support to the Regional Water Supply Company
thread.title_full: Letter of thanks to Satler for his contribution to environmental preservation and support to the Regional Water Supply Company

author: @Vijestime
title: Letter of thanks to Satler for his contribution to environmental preservation and support to the Regional Water Supply Company
text:
The Regional Water Supply Company of the Montenegrin Coast ceremoniously presented a certificate of appreciation to the Ambassador of the European Union to Montenegro, Johan Sattler, in recognition of his contribution to environmental protection, as well as for his long-standing support for the work of the Regional Water Supply Company and recognition of the importance of the mission of this company.
As announced by this state-owned company, the award ceremony was attended by the Executive Director of the Regional Water Supply Company Krsto Radović, the President of the Board of Directors Zoran Lakušić, and the Public Relations Manager Sandra Krapović.
The certificate of appreciation was presented on the occasion of the anniversary, 50 years since the founding and 15 years since the commissioning of the Regional Water Supply Company.
It was emphasized that these forms of cooperation confirm the ongoing commitment to regional development and preservation of natural resources.
The regional water utility expressed its expectation that the partnership will be continued and further strengthened, especially through joint activities that contribute to meeting European standards.
Representatives of the Regional Water Supply Company also reminded of their support for the cleanup campaign "Take care, let it take care of you", within which numerous environmental activities are planned in the upcoming period.
